div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 707 Roksolany, 1962 Burial: late 5th cent. B.C. Contents: 4 AR, 2 AE. In amphora neck fragment Istrus: 2 didr. (as NZ 1917, pl. 28, 405a) 1 dr. 1 fr. (as AMNG I.1, pl. 2, 23) 2 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 8, 7) Disposition: Odessa Zaginaîlo, in † Sbornik rabot aspirantov Odesskogo Gosudarstvennogo Universiteta, Gumanitarnye nauki (Odessa, 1964), pp. 168-9; MASP 5 (1966), pp. 110, 129, nos. 247-52
